wikipedia_page.main: Kris Thackray (born 27 April 1988) is an English former professional footballer who played as a centre-back.

response: Di Bari joined another southern Italy side Cosenza in July 2009 (of Calabria region) In January 2011 he left for hometown club Andria BAT along with Tommaso Coletti. Cosenza also signed Kris Thackray as part of the deal. Despite made 11 starts for the team, he was sold to Taranto as part of the deal to sign Matteo Berretti definitely (who already on loan at Andria since August 2010).
